meaningMnemonic: If you <kanji>exit</kanji> from <kanji>prison</kanji> you are getting your <vocabulary>release from prison</vocabulary>. But, before you move on, let me tell you one thing: Hope is a dangerous thing. Hope can drive a man insane.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
